html:
6.29.22  2:10 pm   are there similarities between soap and ground planes?

      everything is the same

6.29.22  1:20 pm   are you scared of anything

      no way

6.29.22  1:03 pm   so i've noticed some videos you have some real life videos of you playing at points in the song and in others you don't at all. so my question is: what makes you decide whether or not you put real life clips of yourself into the video?

      i try to do it 'some of the time'. If i feel like i'm doing it 'all of the time' or 'none of the time' then it's time to do a course-correction

6.29.22  1:00 pm   How do you keep going with all the things going wrong in the world?

      it's good to recognize what goes right

6.29.22  12:39 pm   which dollar do you prefer
1$ 2$ 5$ 10$ etc

      the purple 5 is pretty wild. but in time that type of style will come to all of them. except probably the 1 and 2

6.29.22  12:39 pm   do you recycle old finalists that didn't make the cut for your song selecting?

      i rebuild the list again from scratch, but there's no rule against letting the same ones come up again. that happens quite often, to the good ones

6.29.22  11:48 am   will you ever tour the world bill

      i'll try

6.29.22  11:48 am   are you christian

      no

6.29.22  11:07 am   have u ever played a one string guitar

      sure, if you count the time i wrapped a rubber band longways around a ruler while sitting in class

6.29.22  10:37 am   why do you dance sometimes

      sometimes that's the only way to tell the cold hard truth

6.29.22  9:35 am   what number is even but feels odd

      7931553391931391551397390

6.29.22  9:10 am   Are YOU a gamer most of the time?

      not exactly

6.29.22  8:32 am   Does the ground plane stay on the ground because its scared?

      pretty much

6.29.22  7:54 am   how do i stop comparing myself to other artists? there are artists i admire and that i try to learn from to improve my art, but it usually ends with feeling like i'll never get to my goal. what to do

      you could take a nice holiday vacation in a cave

6.29.22  7:44 am   where do i ask questions on this website I cant find it

      i have no idea

6.29.22  6:56 am   Is there any unusual time signatures in the next song?

      no but there are some unusual rhythms in the breaks

6.29.22  4:19 am   what's the name of the sound used on Monday Question Questions when it goes 'we came from slime'

      that sounds like one of the ones i adjusted during the christmas jams. either 'have yourself' or 'carolina fuz lead'. if you compare it to the jazz jams around 2014 you'll probably figure out which one

6.29.22  3:55 am   have you made a new song after ground plane?

      doing it now

6.29.22  1:59 am   Can we be friends

      everyone is friends

6.29.22  1:47 am   any talk show plans for the future?

      yes i'd say so

6.29.22  1:20 am   when you get morning anxiety, how do you calm yourself down?

      travel around the world

6.28.22  11:59 pm   is there still an element of randomness to your song selection process, or is the final decision made entirely by you?

      it's usually randomized amongst the final list, which may be anywhere from 4 to 30. "ground plane" was a random selection out of 8. "huge gamer" was a random selection out of 4. "corner store" was a random selection out of 8. "i'm scared" was a random selection out of 16.

6.28.22  11:42 pm   Do you own a slide whistle?

      always rent slide whistles

6.28.22  9:48 pm   thoughts on calculus>

      could come in handy

6.28.22  9:45 pm   How do you find your inspiration to write your music and edit your videos?

     if i don't do it i'll feel bad

     Do you have places you go to find ideas, or do you let them come to you naturally?

     ideas are everywhere. the hard part is remembering how easy it is

      Love your stuff, thanks for the music. :)

6.28.22  9:42 pm   have you ever considered growing a stache?

      no

6.28.22  7:43 pm   what's an object that makes you feel cold an uncomfortable

      ice pants

6.28.22  6:58 pm   Is the ground plane a song about going outside our comfort zone?

      back into

6.28.22  6:48 pm   How many notes do I need to make a song?

      you can get by with any number of notes

6.28.22  6:27 pm   Is the ground plane just like... taking a walk?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.28.22  4:41 pm   Do you write lyrics for your musics or do you write music for your lyrics?

     if things are going well, then it would be both at the exact same time

      Do you first write sheet music then play (or test) it or do you play (test) then write?

     these days i don't use any paper. but when i did, there was usually no instrument involved because i was in the library with ear plugs in

6.28.22  3:26 pm   opinion on c#min7

      without telling me anything else, i there's a 44% chance you are in the key of E, and and a 44% chance you are in the key of B

6.28.22  2:45 pm   rank every 2 letter word in the land of 2 letter words from "might quit"

      that sounds like a bad idea

6.28.22  12:56 pm   what do you think is the most thing ever

      everything

6.28.22  10:51 am   why are they called white grapes when they are green

      to challenge your intuition

6.28.22  10:23 am   do you like saying the word fabric? 

      yes, but i only allow myself to say it on special occasions

6.28.22  9:41 am   Are you optimistic on the future of humanity?

      yes

6.28.22  7:50 am   How many syllables are in supercalifragilisticexpialidocious 

      just enough

6.28.22  7:22 am   What are your thoughts on vegetables? 

      outlandish

6.28.22  4:48 am   favorite piano chord?

      how about this

6.28.22  3:02 am   How come some of your animation looks like the easing has been done by hand in some way?

      because i don't like the robot look, especially as the frame rate gets higher

6.28.22  2:36 am   how much does a ground plane ticket even cost

      it's complimentary

6.28.22  2:22 am   what is your favorite triangle?

      the scalene triangle

6.28.22  1:58 am   whats your opinion on leaves?

      huge

6.28.22  1:12 am   How do you jump?

      try to push the ground away

6.27.22  10:21 pm   is music theory important

      whatever floats your boat

6.27.22  9:13 pm   is a tomato a fruit or a figment of my imagination

      figment of fruit

6.27.22  9:11 pm   what's the difference between a hippie and a hipster

      the time period

6.27.22  8:35 pm   hello how is your day:)

     pretty good

     also any thoughts on hold music?

      you may never find it again

6.27.22  7:09 pm   got a job working the front desk at a bed and breakfast. any advice?

      first make sure you can tell the difference between bed and breakfast
